job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Software Engineer required by a Healthcare start-up focused on home healthcare. Their goal is to combine service and modern technology in order to provide exceptional experiences for patients. They are looking for a Software Engineer to join their team in NYC. The role: 3+years’ experience with Java or Python Experience with AWS Spring Boot Compensation: Up to $170,000 plus benefits and stock options If this Software Engineer Positon could be of interest please apply through this advert, or send a copy of your Resume to C.Gregoire@x4technology.us
